description: Details of Tree Protection pursuant to condition 5 of planning permission 204905FUL dated 27.10.2022 for 'Construction of 6  two-bedroom residential dwelling houses with basement levels and associated landscaping'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted arboricultural report pursuant to condition 5 (Arboricultural Method Statement for the protection of existing trees and hedgerows) of planning permission ref: 204905FUL dated 27.10.2022 are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with policies G5 and G7 of the London Plan (2021), policy 5.10 of Ealing's Development Management DPD and Ealing's SPG 9 - Trees and Development Guidelines.
